:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: questions 

- How to find the location and function of genes on a bacterial genome?

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: objectives

- Do a physical annotation of a bacterial genome 
- Do a functional annotation of the same genome

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: keypoints 

- Physical annotation of bacterial genomes finds open-reading frames and start codons 
- Functional annotation infers function by aligning protein sequences to databases

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
